properties.name: grails.gorm.failOnError
properties.description: Whether to throw an exception on validation error.

properties.name: grails.gorm.default.mapping
properties.description: The default mapping to apply to all classes.

properties.name: grails.gorm.default.constraints
properties.description: The default constraints to apply to all classes.

properties.name: grails.transaction.chainedTransactionManager.blacklistPattern
properties.description: The pattern of transaction manager bean names to deny to register.

properties.name: grails.transaction.chainedTransactionManager.whitelistPattern
properties.description: The pattern of transaction manager bean names to allow to register.

properties.name: grails.transaction.chainedTransactionManager.enabled
properties.description: Wheather to enable chained transaction management.

properties.name: hibernate.osiv.enabled
properties.description: Register OpenSessionInViewInterceptor that binds a Hibernate Session to the thread for the entire processing of the request.

properties.name: hibernate.hbm2ddl.auto
properties.description: Whether to create the tables on startup.

properties.name: hibernate.cache.use_second_level_cache
properties.description: Whether to use the second level cache.

properties.name: hibernate.configLocations
properties.description: Location of additional Hibernate XML configuration files.

properties.name: hibernate.packagesToScan
properties.description: Specify packages to search for autodetection of your entity classes in the classpath.
